Activity: Check emails and news. Review feedback received from the design team and incorporate it into current designs.
Continue refining prop designs. Focus on creating a cohesive visual style for the props. Consider the overall art direction of the game and how the props will contribute to the atmosphere.
Experiment with different materials and textures for the props. Use reference images to create realistic and believable materials. Consider how the materials will interact with light and shadow.
Take a break. Browse online art galleries for inspiration. Look for artists who specialize in prop design.

Work on finalizing color palettes. Focus on creating a set of colors that will be used throughout the game. Consider the overall mood and atmosphere of the game and how the colors will contribute to it.

Create color studies for different environments and characters. Use the color palette to create a sense of harmony and unity. Experiment with different lighting scenarios and how they affect the colors.
Prepare a presentation of the week's work. Select the best designs and color palettes to showcase to the art team.
Review next week's goals and start brainstorming ideas.
